column2: Statute under which  the offender is  charged.  He  should also regard the effect of
the punishment, as deterrent act and consider in  what extent it will be effective:
imprisonment and a fine of Rs.  10,000/- which in our view completely inadequate.
After  carefully  considering  all  circumstances  we  dismiss  the  appeal  and  vacate  the

column1: sentence passed  thereon and  impose the following sentence. The Accused-Appellant

column2: is  sentenced to 8 years  rigorous' imprisonment and a fine of Rs.121,  500/-
